body:
It's a workaround, which could be find, still, that would need some code
refactoring...

On Wed, Apr 13, 2016, 20:47 Michael Fraenkel <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> The simple fix is to add the type for Mes
> type base struct{
> Id int64 json:"id"
> Mes Mes json:"mes"
> }
>
> The result is
>
>
> [{"id":1,"mes":2},{"id":2,"mes":1}]
>
